page.title: 09NEATH HILL SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: Neath Hill Shopping Centre has 84 car parking spaces, 3 for disabled drivers and one for ambulances. The garage repairs cars and sells second hand cars. They also do M.O.T. tests. There is a Milton Keynes Dental Laboratory and Goldcrest Computer Services. The hairdressers are open Monday to Saturday without a lunch break. Phil Corley's bike shop sells and repairs bikes. The Estate Agent is also a Building Society branch. The newsagents and the supermarket are open from 6.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. Monday to Saturday, but on Sunday they are open from 9.00 a.m. to 1.00 p.m. The clock tower was opened in 1980. There is also a telephone kiosk and a post box. The letters are collected twice a day but not on Sundays.
